en.meta_description: Effortlessly add analytics to your Laravel and Filament PHP applications with Pirsch, while protecting your customers' privacy.

en.headline: Supercharge Your Laravel and Filament Analytics with Pirsch
en.text: Effortlessly add analytics to your Laravel and Filament PHP applications with Pirsch, while protecting your customers' privacy.

en.headline: Easy-to-use Plugins and SDK
en.text:
Integrate Pirsch Analytics seamlessly into your Laravel and Filament PHP applications. Our plugin allows you to track page views and events in a non-blockable way on the server side, no JavaScript snippet or proxy required.

Leverage our PHP SDK or use an existing Filament dashboard widget to get insights right on your dashboard. The integration only takes a couple of minutes.

Uncompromised and privacy-friendly web analytics

Pirsch is an uncompromised and privacy friendly web analytics solution hosted in Germany. Fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA and PECR.

Say goodbye to annoying cookie banners while respecting the privacy of your visitors. We do not store personal information or IP addresses, nor do we sell data to advertisers.

Learn more

Seamless Switch

Make the switch from Google Analytics, Fathom, or Plausible seamlessly by importing your existing data. Try Pirsch Analytics free of charge for 30 days with no credit card required.

Start 30-day Free Trial

Open-Source on GitHub

A lot of Pirsch is open source, including the core, SDKs, and libraries we have created for our service. So you can see for yourself how we work and how Pirsch functions. The code is available on GitHub, including a demo repository with sample applications and more.

See All Demos

Detailed Documentation

Pirsch is well documented. We are constantly updating our documentation to make sure you always find an answer to your questions.

Read the Docs

Personal Support

We're IT specialists, not salesmen. When you contact us for support, you can be sure to get competent and professional help, whether you have questions about integration details, networking, or programming. We're here to help, and we're here to find solutions to the challenges you face.
